content: pdf digital crochet pattern the rusty road crop top is worked in two rectangular pieces with a simple lace stitch the top is completed by seaming the rectangles together leaving a neck opening the stitch pattern creates a beautiful open pattern that is light and airy for spring and summer length is easily adjustable to shorten or lengthen this soft and lightweight design is made in knit picks/wecrochet fingering weight stroll skill level easy the pattern is written in standard american terms video tutorial **yarn requirements ** knit picks/wecrochet stroll- 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon 231 yds/50g shown in pumpkin https //shrsl com/2nfnw yards 500 560 625 680 740 790 875 915 1000 # balls 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 5 **crochet hook requirements ** us e/4 3 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge us g+/7 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge **additional supplies ** yarn needle removable stitch markers blocking mat and pins **gauge ** 16 sts and 9 25 row equal to 4 in lace pattern with 3 5mm hook blocked 18 5 sts and 11 75 row equal to 4 in lace pattern with 3 5mm hook unblocked you are welcome to sell the finished products from this design please reference sentry box designs as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
